A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Deeply dissapointed in the direction Disney has taken the franchise. They've completely destroyed Star Wars. Not only did they rewrite who the original characters are\, they've killed them all off. Without any feeling whatsoever. I don't even think I can convey how upset and dissapoint I am that Disney would do this to those that were true to the original trilogy. This is nothing more than a way to pass the torch to a new generation and screw everybody else to make more money from a new generation. That's the real message here. It has nothing to do with the story or tradition. It is what it is. And now it's over. Thanks Disney!
